entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
